reviewText:
This is just plain out horrible, here's a list for ya:
Horrible sound quality (sound was off track)
Terrible lighting
Unbearable acting, by far some of the worst i've ever seen
Terrible directing
and to top it all of the costume is a gorilla suit, really, a gorilla suit.

So, horribly dissapointed, do not, I repeat, DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!
This is what happens when you put a bunch of ill acted people together with basic Halloween custome/make up. I bought it since I am an avid werewolf fan, but I wouldn't recommend watching it.
